Module com.fy916.bubblebobble
Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers

Class LeaderBoardController

java.lang.Object
com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers.Controller
com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers.LeaderBoardController
public class LeaderBoardController extends Controller
This class is extended from Controller.
This class utilize the LeaderBoardImageLoader to facilitate the rendering process.
Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern. In charge of rendering the leader board from the main, is the controller of the FXML based scene.
Author:
fy916
